name: OneShot Parkour Demo
description:
Stuff You Can Do

You Can Jump The Fences By Jumping Near Them And Pressing 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                                          Movement

WASD = Walking

Shift+W = Run

C = Crouching

Shift+W+C = Sliding

Spacebar = Jump

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                                                Hint

I Forgot To Add A Close Menu So You Might Have To Hit The Windows Button And Close It
